item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Charles-
I mention it because I was surprised. I ran the installer several times hoping that there was a button or something that I had missed.
item.content:encoded:
@Charles-

I mention it because I was surprised. I ran the installer several times hoping that there was a button or something that I had missed.

item.title: By: Charles Teague
item.dc:creator: Charles Teague
item.description:
Hey,
You're right- there is currently no option to customize where Writer (or any other application in the 'Live Suite') gets installed. Sorry about that.
Best,
Charles (MSFT)
item.content:encoded:
Hey,

You’re right- there is currently no option to customize where Writer (or any other application in the ‘Live Suite’) gets installed. Sorry about that.

Best,

Charles (MSFT)
